川田恵介

Associate professor, [Institute of Social Sciences](https://www.iss.u-tokyo.ac.jp/), and also [Center for Social Research and Data Archives](https://csrda.iss.u-tokyo.ac.jp/english/), [The University of Tokyo](https://www.u-tokyo.ac.jp/en/index.html) (since 2017).

**Academic area:** Economics

**Research interest:** Labor Economics, Development Economics, Empirical Economics with Machine Learning

**Research papers:** See [publon](https://publons.com/researcher/3520251/keisuke-kawata/publications/), [google scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=edeB7xsAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao), [researcher map](https://researchmap.jp/kawatakeisuke?lang=en), and [github](https://github.com/tetokawata)

**Lecture in this semester:** Econometrics (in Musashi University)
